brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to continue follow up of conservatively treated CHI patients
      and to focus on their metabolic outcome, including frequency of hypoglycemia after
      discontinuing treatment and incidence of diabetes mellitus in the long term.

clinical_study.brief_title: Long Term Glucose Metabolism in Conservatively Treated Patients With Congenital Hyperinsulinism

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  conservatively treated CHI patients who are in remission for at least one year

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  none

study_pop.textblock:
The study will include conservatively treated CHI patients who are in remission for at
        least one year

clinical_study.official_title: Long Term Glucose Metabolism in Conservatively Treated Patients With Congenital Hyperinsulinism

oversight_info.authority: Israel: Israeli Health Ministry Pharmaceutical Administration

primary_outcome.measure: presence and frequency of hypoglycemia and hyperglycemia.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
